subject: Business
title: The Future: Autonomous Supply Chains
description: A quick win: understand The Future: Autonomous Supply Chains.

hook.text: An AI detects a typhoon forming near Taiwan. It automatically reroutes orders to backup suppliers before humans even.

buildup.text: Autonomous supply chains use AI, IoT sensors, and real-time data to make decisions without human intervention.

discovery.text: Self-driving trucks, drone deliveries, and robotic warehouses are already operational at pilot scale.

twist.text: Full autonomy requires perfect data. Most supply chains still run on spreadsheets, emails, and phone calls.

climax.text: Gartner predicts that by 2035, 25% of supply chain decisions will be made by AI agents acting autonomously.

punchline.text: The supply chain of the future thinks for itself.

quiz.question: What is the biggest barrier to autonomous supply chains?
options: Most supply chains lack the data quality needed for AI-driven decisions
